code: import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import useFetchData from"../components/FatchData";import'./Carousel.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CarouselView(){const{data,_}=useFetchData("gallery");const{id}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const currentIndex=data.findIndex(p=>p.id===Number(id));const currentPokemon=data[currentIndex];const goPrev=()=>{const prevIndex=(currentIndex-1+data.length)%data.length;navigate("/carousel/".concat(data[prevIndex].id));};const goNext=()=>{const nextIndex=(currentIndex+1)%data.length;navigate("/carousel/".concat(data[nextIndex].id));};if(!currentPokemon)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Pok\xE9mon not found"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"carousel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goPrev,children:"\u2B05 Prev"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pokemon-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[currentPokemon.id," ",currentPokemon.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:currentPokemon.image,alt:currentPokemon.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Types: ",currentPokemon.types.join(", ")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:currentPokemon.stats.map(s=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[s.name,": ",s.value]},s.name))})]})]},currentPokemon.id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goNext,children:"Next \u27A1"})]});}
